Class XMLwriteManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • operators.XMLwriteManager

  • public class XMLwriteManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Writes brand new or modified xml-file. Uses StaX for reading and writing the file.
    Author:
    Antti Kurronen

      • startWritingProcess

        public boolean startWritingProcess(LayersOfPath layersOfPathIn)
        Starts the writing of given ImageLayer- objects into given XML-file. If file exist, the information is append or overWritten depending of existence of ImageLayers and MarkingLayers in XML-file.
        Parameters:
        layersOfPathIn - LayersOfPath, which contains the XML-file path where from read xml-data and where to save the data.
        Returns:
        Boolean value true if saving was made, false otherwise.
